availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Browing (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker. Kentucky native. Married to Priscilla Rice Browning. Father of Thomas N. Browning, James W. Browning, Mary Charlotte Browning, Sally Browning, Phoebe Browning, Martha E Browning, and Nancy Browning. Farm worker in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bracken County Marriages, Film #344,098, p.1119
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 423A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 686.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct 1, p. 403B.
